title: Can I get a virtual marks card semester wise in online ?
content: Can I get a virtual marks card semester wise in online of engineering in pes University.If yes and how is it possible.

comments.body: U will get the provisional result right? that itself is your virtual marks card.
Actually to submit it for higher studies and  they are specifying for University name .in provisional online result will not get that right ?
okkk, I think there was some form put up on pesuacademy to request for virtual marks cards or marks card duplicates. See if that's still available, if not contact COE.
You can get a provisional transcript and a provisional degree certificate
Yes you can get a digitally signed transcript on Digilocker.
Yes but what to fill in Reg No. Details? Tried filling both SRN and PRNs isn't working
Yes but what to fill in Reg No. Details? Tried filling both SRN and PRNs isn't working
Saar what to fill in Reg No. For digilocker docs, tried SRN, PRN didn't work:p
same, i have the same issue. Any workaround?
Same issue here. Did you find a solution?
